badges.name: Play First Game!
badges.description: You have played your first Quick Draw game! Welcome to the party!

badges.name: Win a Game!
badges.description: Congrats on your first win! Let's Keep Going!

badges.name: Fast!
badges.description: You finished a game under 30 seconds!

badges.name: Speedy!
badges.description: You finished a game under 15 seconds!

badges.name: Turbo!
badges.description: You finished a game under 10 seconds!

badges.name: Lightning!
badges.description: You finished a game under 5 seconds! You're cracked!

badges.name: Easy-Peasy!
badges.description: You won a game with all 'easy' settings!

badges.name: Lose a Game!
badges.description: Tough luck! Try again, and you'll get it!

badges.name: Newbie!
badges.description: You've played 5 games!

badges.name: Amateur!
badges.description: You've played 10 games!

badges.name: Competent!
badges.description: You've played 25 games!

badges.name: Proficient!
badges.description: You've played 50 games!

badges.name: Expert!
badges.description: You've played 100 games! That's a lot!
